text: Ricardo Rozzi is an academic from Chile's University of Magallanes and the University of North Texas He is the director of the Cape Horn International Center for Global Change Studies and Biocultural Conservation (CHIC) ==Grants and scientific works== *R.Rozzi on ANID.cl Profiles ==References== Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:Chilean biologists Category:Ecologists
title: Ricardo Rozzi
